title: Raptail watch face
summary: Raptail is exquisite watch face for Moto 360, LG G Watch R & others Smart watch
description: Model NumberDW-A18CategoryFuturistic Product description Raptail is an exquisite watch face for all smart watches, an active pushy design makes it a superb gadget (It has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R and Sony Smart watch 3).it is available for all kind of watches including round and rectangle. it has customization feature which allows you to change watch face needle style (Tick or Smooth).it has following features•	Smooth & Tick Needle Style•	Phone Battery•	Wear Battery•	Day•	Date•	Month•	Custom Ambient Mode•	Default Ambient Mode Pack•	Square & Round Watches SupportAnd it doesn't end yet, follow the new customization options, features and updates, don't forget to make a comment and please kindly leave your feedback and suggestions!(Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu)Keep an eye out for our others watch face creations that are coming out soon!Follow Us on Twitter !  http://www.twitter.com/droiipd Like Us on Facebook !  http://www.facebook.com/droiipdFollow Us on Instagram !  https://www.instagram.com/droiipdFollow Us on Google Plus ! https://plus.google.com/104043898612133973188It has following featuresFeatures: •	Smooth & Tick Needle Style•	Phone Battery•	Wear Battery•	Day•	Date•	Month•	Custom Ambient Mode•	Default Ambient Mode Pack•	Square & Round Watches SupportConfiguration:  ✔ switch  between Tick & smooth needle style ✔pick your favorite ambient mode For Email support Contact us at  droiipd@gmail.comTip 1Now we support 280x280 and 320x320 square watchesTip 2✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after re-sync, try these steps:1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone)2. Uninstall the watch face3. Restart watch and connect device again4. Then finally install the watch faceTo install:1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Raptail  Watch Face as your watch faceNotePlease, rate us positive if you like our watch faces! Don't give a bad rating too soon. If you experienced a problem, please, send us an email and we will be happy to answer it and fix an issue soon as possible.Compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, Sony smart watches... (Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu)And that is not the end of it watch for the new customization options and features coming soon, and we'd love to hear from you what you would like to see on it!
descriptionHTML:
Model Number
DW-A18

Category
Futuristic

Product description

Raptail is an exquisite watch face for all smart watches, an active pushy design makes it a superb gadget (It has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R and Sony Smart watch 3).it is available for all kind of watches including round and rectangle. it has customization feature which allows you to change watch face needle style (Tick or Smooth).it has following features

• Smooth & Tick Needle Style
• Phone Battery
• Wear Battery
• Day
• Date
• Month
• Custom Ambient Mode
• Default Ambient Mode Pack
• Square & Round Watches Support


And it doesn't end yet, follow the new customization options, features and updates,
don't forget to make a comment and please kindly leave your feedback and suggestions!
(Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu)


Keep an eye out for our others watch face creations that are coming out soon!
Follow Us on Twitter ! http://www.twitter.com/droiipd
Like Us on Facebook ! http://www.facebook.com/droiipd
Follow Us on Instagram ! https://www.instagram.com/droiipd
Follow Us on Google Plus ! https://plus.google.com/104043898612133973188
It has following features

Features:
• Smooth & Tick Needle Style
• Phone Battery
• Wear Battery
• Day
• Date
• Month
• Custom Ambient Mode
• Default Ambient Mode Pack
• Square & Round Watches Support

Configuration:
✔ switch between Tick & smooth needle style
✔pick your favorite ambient mode

For Email support Contact us at droiipd@gmail.com

Tip 1
Now we support 280x280 and 320x320 square watches
Tip 2
✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after re-sync, try these steps:
1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone)
2. Uninstall the watch face
3. Restart watch and connect device again
4. Then finally install the watch face
To install:
1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.
2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Raptail Watch Face as your watch face
Note

Please, rate us positive if you like our watch faces! Don't give a bad rating too soon. If you experienced a problem, please, send us an email and we will be happy to answer it and fix an issue soon as possible.
Compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, Sony smart watches...

(Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu)

And that is not the end of it watch for the new customization options and features coming soon, and we'd love to hear from you what you would like to see on it!
comments: Amazing skinny watchface 5 STAR Really cool watchface optimize for square watches looks amazing on my LG G Watch R
